Name: Cold wires
About the game: Where this world is heading is no longer a question. 2045, with a rebellious machine with artificial intelligence, steel claws and firm confidence in every step, it goes hunting! You control this very deadly combat vehicle, on which you have to destroy all the ill-wishers who find themselves in your defeat zone. Cold wires-is a 2D arcade game with a side view, the essence of which is to clean the playing field and charge with the battery. Game Features: - 25 levels with increasing difficulty - Unusual gameplay - Pixel art graphics
